WELCOME!

Welcome to the presentations and tutorials page of the
Bioinformatics Core Facility of the Max Planck Institute for Biology of Ageing.


How to use this site:
Use the "up" and "down" keys or "space" to navigage inside a presentation/module.
Use the "left" and "right" keys to navigate between diferent modules.
Press "f" for full screen.
Now press "space" and choose one topic.



http://bioinformatics.age.mpg.de
